price: Efirisε, yɛsuro muna ne ahokyerε Da kεseε a efiri yεn Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ no.
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
